titles.title: A resolution congratulating Boys Town on its 90th anniversary celebration.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 12/12/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Expresses the heartfelt congratulations of the Senate to the Boys Town family on the historic occasion of its 90th anniversary. Extends its thanks to the extraordinary Boys Town community for its important work with our Nation's children and families.
